trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Define atributos relacionados con el tamaño de una imagen de mapa de bits almacenada en caché.

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: Se escala a un mapa de bits en función de los valores definidos por esta clase.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> con propiedades de tamaño vacías.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> tendrá su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> establecido en `true`, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> establecido en cero y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> establecido en cero.

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: Cuando se pasan a un <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, la entrada es el mismo que el resultado.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Alto del mapa de bits resultante, en píxeles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que conserva la relación de aspecto del mapa de bits de origen y especifica una propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight" /> inicial.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> tendrá su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> establecido en `true`, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> establecida en el valor de `pixelHeight`y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> establecido en cero.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> es menor que cero.

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: Valor de rotación inicial que se debe aplicar.

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se admiten solo incrementos de 90 grados.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> to apply.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que conserva la relación de aspecto del mapa de bits de origen y especifica una propiedad <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation" /> inicial que se debe aplicar.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: El mapa de bits resultante mantiene su relación de aspecto y el tamaño original.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> tendrá su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propiedad establecida en el valor de `rotation`, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> establecido en `true`, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> establecido en 0 y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> establecido en 0.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Alto del mapa de bits resultante, en píxeles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que conserva la relación de aspecto del mapa de bits de origen y especifica una propiedad <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth" /> inicial.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> tendrá su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> establecido en `true`, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> establecido en cero y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> establecida en el valor de `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando <paramref name="pixelWidth" /> es menor que cero.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Alto del mapa de bits resultante, en píxeles.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Alto del mapa de bits resultante, en píxeles.

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" /> que no conserva la relación de aspecto del mapa de bits original.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions" />.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: El mapa de bits resultante tiene un tamaño efectivo de `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: El valor devuelto <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> tendrá su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> propiedad establecida en <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation.Rotate0>, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> establecido en `false`, sus <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> establecida en el valor de `pixelHeight`y su <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> establecida en el valor de `pixelWidth`.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando <paramref name="pixelHeight" /> es menor que cero.

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Alto, en píxeles, de la imagen de mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Alto del mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> debe ser mayor que cero para ser válida.

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Ancho, en píxeles, del mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Ancho del mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> debe ser mayor que cero para ser válida.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que determina si se conserva la relación de aspecto de la imagen de mapa de bits original.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se mantiene la relación de aspecto original; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Si se conserva la relación de aspecto original, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> representan los valores de tamaño máximo para el mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: Solo se garantiza que el mapa de bits resultante es tener su ancho o alto coinciden con los valores especificados.

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: Si la relación de aspecto no se conserva, especificado <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> y <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> se usan ambos, y el mapa de bits se expande para utilizar esos valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene un valor que represente el ángulo de rotación que se aplica a un mapa de bits.

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: Ángulo de rotación que se aplica a la imagen.

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se admiten solo incrementos de 90 grados.
